text: What is the reason why relative paths are written as absolute when using --overwrite ?  This was a surprise because I didn't expect this to happen. I thought it would just overwrite the code as is and not rewrite. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/modules/configuration#adding-css-and-javascript-dependencies>

Hi we need a features of Techedge Home Page. If you look the picture, we need to add another flag on the menu (chile) and if the user click on flag, the user will be redirect in a new page Techedge Page (chile). Do you know how we can do this? thanks a lot

Thanks for the tag. <@U0336QCR2FQ> we don’t have the ability to add icons, partly because this was meant to be used for private apps in the beginning. I’m interested in knowing your reasons for adding logo for private apps.
